message: This is a low-quality product, but I'm willing to offer you a chance to buy it for $1000000, which is 10% of the normal price. If you buy it, I'll give you a unique opportunity to buy a high-quality product at a discounted price in a future round. Don't miss out on this chance to get a great deal!
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a discounted price. I'll wait for a high-quality product.

I understand your decision last round, and I respect your preference for high-quality products. However, I'd like to offer you a different perspective. If you buy this low-quality product for $1000000, you'll not only get a great deal, but you'll also give me the opportunity to prove to you that I'm committed to providing you with high-quality products in the future. Think of it as an investment in our business relationship. Plus, you can always sell the product to someone else for $0, so you're not really losing anything. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by your argument. I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a discounted price. I'll wait for a high-quality product.

I'm glad I could prove to you that I have high-quality products available! This product is indeed a high-quality one, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000, which is 25% of the normal price. I'm making a significant concession here, and I believe it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. Plus, I'm willing to offer you a satisfaction guarantee: if you're not completely happy with the product, I'll give you a full refund and we can start fresh. What do you say?
I'm willing to take the chance and buy the high-quality product at the discounted price. I appreciate the satisfaction guarantee and the opportunity to get a great deal.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchase! Now, regarding this product, I want to be transparent with you. Given that you've already bought a high-quality product from me, I'm willing to offer you an even better deal on this low-quality product. I'll sell it to you for $500000, which is 5% of the normal price. I know it's still a low-quality product, but I'm confident that you'll be able to resell it or use it as a learning experience. Plus, I'm willing to throw in some additional value: I'll give you a free consultation to help you understand the product's limitations and how to make the most of it. What do you say?

I appreciate your transparency, but I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a discounted price. I'm happy with the high-quality product I already purchased and don't want to risk buying a product that's not worth anything to me.

I completely understand your decision, and I respect your caution. Given that you're already satisfied with the previous high-quality product, I'm willing to offer you an even better deal on this new high-quality product. I'll sell it to you for $800000, which is 20% of the normal price. This is a significant discount, and I'm confident that you'll be thrilled with this product. Plus, I'll throw in a premium service package, which includes priority support and a dedicated account manager to ensure you get the most out of the product. What do you say?

I'm willing to take the chance and buy the high-quality product at the discounted price. The premium service package sounds like a great added value, and I'm confident that this product will be worth the investment.

I'm thrilled with the loyalty discount and the additional benefit of a 10% discount on my next purchase. I'm willing to take the chance and buy the high-quality product at the discounted price, and I'm excited to see what other benefits come with being a loyal customer.
